title: parama dayAnidhE
sahitya:
parama dayAnidhE pArthasArathE


anupallavi

  suranuta niravadhi sukhadAyikE


caraNam 1    ari dasha kaNTha sOdaruniki lnkApuramuna sthiragApuramu jEsina shrI
    caraNam 2    jayamu kOrinavi jayuni kirNamuna bhayamu lEkana bhayamosagina shrI
    caraNam 3    urubalu bANuni kramuladrunci puraripu kailAsa puramu jErccina shrI
    caraNam 4    nIladhu nAbha sadA ninu golicina gOpAladAsuni paripAlana jEsina shrI
